com.myspace.myspaceid.oauth
Class OAuthServer

java.lang.Object
  com.myspace.myspaceid.oauth.OAuthServer

public class OAuthServer
extends java.lang.Object

Encapsulates an OAuthServer against which we send requests for tokens, etc.

Constructor.

setAccessToken

public void setAccessToken(OAuthToken accessToken)
Sets the access token to use.

Parameters:
accessToken - The access token that has been obtained and which we will use against this server.

generateRequestUrl

public java.lang.String generateRequestUrl(java.lang.String path)
Generates request URL with a given path (i.e., request_token, authorize, etc.).

Parameters:
path - The initial URL path, e.g., http://api.myspace.com/request_token.
Returns:
The URL generated.

generateRequestUrl

public java.lang.String generateRequestUrl(java.lang.String path,
                                           java.lang.String tokenSecret,
                                           java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> args)
Generates request URL with a given path (i.e., request_token, authorize, etc.).

Parameters:
path - The initial URL path, e.g., http://api.myspace.com/request_token.
tokenSecret - A token secret to use, if any. This is required for obtaining the access token and for subsequent data access.
args - A Map containing any additional parameters required for this particular request.
Returns:
The URL generated.

doHttpReq

public java.lang.String doHttpReq(java.lang.String urlStr)
Does an HTTP request.

Parameters:
urlStr - URL to send request to.
Returns:
The response from the remote server.
